meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>hemp</kanji> <kanji>drunk</kanji>ness is when you take some "hemp" and put it into your body so you don't really feel anything anymore. This is <vocabulary>anesthesia</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
